main.name: Lokesh Reddi
main.description: I make Web Application and Website using React JS and Java Tech Stack
main.bio: I love to code and create amazing web apps. I have experience working in some of the best compaines in the world. I am actively learning and practicing Machine Learning at the moment.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: International Institute of Information Technology Bangalore
education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma ,Machine learning & Artificial Intelligence
education.description: 30 Case Studies and Assignments, 450 Hours of Learning, lots of teamwork, and finally I am proud to complete my  PG diploma in artificial intelligence and machine learning. Looking forward to do some really cool projects in Deep learning.

work.title: Senior Full Stack Developer (AVP)
work.description: Worked in wholesale banking division of Wells Fargo, built web applications for Commercial Cards processing. Winner of Global Technology Hackathon 2019 (Wells Fargo) in the challenge Vendor Interaction Management System.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked for important banking domain clients like Bank of America, AIG and Deluxe Corporation.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: Lokesh is a wonderful person to work with he has commendable knowledge on Java/J2EE tech stack I know him as a back end developer for quite some time but he excelled in React JS in a span of few months and contributed to projects as well, he is a sincere and smart working guy..
